content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Helm Chart 3.0.4 June 27, 2025—The 3.0.4 Helm Chart release includes the following: Enhancements Improved namespace management in Red Hat OpenShift. Bug fixes Fixed Scout error in Amazon ECS and Red Hat OpenShift. Upgrade instructions Sample upgrade command: helm upgrade \ --values overrides.yaml \ --namespace trendmicro-system \ trendmicro \ https://github.com/trendmicro/visionone-container-security-helm/archive/3.0.4.tar.gz References https://github.com/trendmicro/visionone-container-security-helm/releases/tag/3.0.4 © 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated.
